name: Hopper
line: Hey, you reached Jim. I'm probably doing something incredible right now, and I can't...

name: Will
line: It's like... It's like I feel what the shadow monster's feeling. See what he's seeing.

name: Will
line: Some of him is there. But some of him is here, too.

name: Will
line: In this house and... in me. It's like... It's like he's reaching into Hawkins more and more. And the more he spreads, the more connected to him I feel.

name: Unknown
line: And the more you see these now-memories.

name: Will
line: At first I just felt it in the back of my head. I didn't even really know it was there. It's like when you have a dream and you can't remember it unless you think really hard. It was like that. But now it's like... Now I remember. I remember all the time.

name: Unknown
line: Just think about it, Will. You're like a spy now. A superspy. Spying on the shadow monster. If you know what he's seeing and feeling... maybe that's how we can stop him. Maybe all of this is happening for a reason.

name: Will
line: What if he figures out we're spying on him? What if he spies back?

name: Unknown
line: We'd like a... uh, a room.

name: Unknown
line: We got those. You want a single or a double?

name: Jonathan
line: Hmm. What? Nothing. Just... déjà vu.

name: Nancy
line: Yeah. Don't you think it's weird?

name: Nancy
line: How we only seem to hang out when the world's about to end?

name: Nancy
line: Feels like it. Still have yours?

name: Nancy
line: To us? After everything, you just... disappeared.

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah, Will needed me. And Steve...

name: Will
line: I saw him. Hopper. I think he's in trouble. I think he's going to die.

name: Lucas
line: When Mom's mad at you, how do you make her not mad?

name: Mrs. Sinclair
line: Hmm. That's a great question. How do you, hon?

name: Mr. Sinclair
line: First, I apologize. Then, I get your mother whatever she wants.

name: Claudia
line: Dusty, baby, you're sure she's not in your room?

name: Claudia
line: Thank you so much, Mr. McCorkle. Thank you so much. You are a true lifesaver. All right, this was great. Thank you. All right. Have a good one. Bye-bye, now. All right. You, too.

name: Claudia
line: No. But they saw her wandering around Loch Nora. How did the poor baby get all the way out there?

name: Dustin
line: I don't know. Lost, I guess.

name: Claudia
line: But they're gonna look for her. And I'll stay here, just in case they call again. And you're gonna go help look? Yeah? Yeah? Give me hug. Give me a hug. Go get her.

name: Dustin
line: All right, Dart. Breakfast time. Oh, my God. Oh, my God. Oh, my God. Oh, my God. Oh, my God. Shit. Shit. Shit. Shit. Shit. Shit. Shit. Shit. Shit. Shit. Shit. Shit. Shit. Shit. Shit. Shit. Come on. Come on, I know you're hungry. Yes. Yes, yes, yes. Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes. Shit! I'm sorry. You ate my cat.

name: man
line: All right. I think this is it.

name: Unknown
line: Hey. You apologize to your mama, yeah? Huh?

name: man
line: Must be scared half to death. How long's it been?

name: Unknown
line: Look, I don't want your Thin Mints, all right, kid? Or your religious mumbo jumbo. Whatever you're selling, I ain't buying, okay?

name: man
line: Name a way you occupy your time when you're having a boring day at work.

name: Terry
line: Three to the right. Four to the left.

name: Terry
line: Breathe. Sunflower. Rainbow. Three to the right. Four to the left. Four-fifty. Breathe.

name: Eleven
line: Mama? It's me... Jane. I'm here now.

name: Terry
line: Breathe. Sunflower. Rainbow. Four-fifty. Breathe. Sunflower. Rainbow.

name: Jonathan
line: Are you positive this is the right place?

name: Murray
line: Not the loudspeaker. Above you, to the right.

name: Murray
line: Nancy Wheeler. Jonathan Byers. You two are a long way from home. Well... I hope you didn't come all this way to tell me about the bear in the Harrington kid's backyard. I've heard that one already.

name: Murray
line: Take a look. Go ahead, don't be shy. I followed up on 200 tips, most bogus, but that's how these things always go, okay? I know every last step Barbara took that day, every last person she talked to. The answer to what happened to your friend, it's up here somewhere. I assure you that. I just gotta connect the right dots.

name: Nancy
line: Your timeline is wrong. And the girl with the buzzed hair, she's not Russian. She's from Hawkins Lab. Her name was Eleven.

name: Jonathan
line: You might wanna sit down for this.

name: Unknown
line: If you're not out in an hour...

name: Max
line: Walking home. Yeah, yeah, I know.

name: Unknown
line: Short circuit in the motherboard. A real bummer. But fret not. I got another machine up and running in the back.

name: Max
line: You better get me that date now, Sinclair.

name: Unknown
line: And keep things PG in here, all right?

name: Max
line: Sorry. I just needed a safe place.

name: Lucas
line: A safe place to what? Be creepy?

name: Max
line: Listen. I'm gonna tell you the truth about everything that happened last year. But if anyone finds out, you could be arrested. Possibly killed.

name: Max
line: I need to know. Do you accept the risk?

name: Lucas
line: Oh, my God! This... this is so stupid. Do you accept the risk?

name: Max
line: Yeah. Sure. Fine. I accept the risk.

name: Lucas
line: Let's hear it. Last year... Will didn't get lost in the woods. He got lost somewhere else.

name: Joyce
line: Hey, is this where you saw him? Is this where you saw Hopper?

name: Joyce
line: Okay, so... so Hopper is here?

name: Mike
line: Yeah. Now we just need to find out where here is, right?

name: Mike
line: Did he say anything? I mean, before he left?

name: Bob
line: Surprise. I would've called, but you said not to clog up the line.

name: Joyce
line: You know, I... We're fine, we don't need anything.

name: Bob
line: When I was sick as a kid, and I was sick all the time as a kid, nothing made me feel better than focusing on these brain teasers. Those are great. Ah... I could teach him how to play.

name: Bob
line: Okay. I could wait with you?

name: Joyce
line: Listen, it's just not a good time. But, um, you know what? I'll call you, okay?

name: Bob
line: Well, have him call me. They don't call me Bob the Brain for nothing.

name: Joyce
line: I... I told you the rules. No questions, okay?

name: Joyce
line: We... we just need you to help us figure out what... Bob? Bob? Over here.

name: Joyce
line: That's the objective. Find the X.

name: Bob
line: Yeah? What's at the X? Pirate treasure?

name: Joyce
line: Let me talk to you for a second. Hang on, guys.

name: Bob
line: Joyce, you can talk to me. You know that, right?

name: Bob
line: What's the problem? Joyce, Will doesn't look well. You don't look well. What's going on?

name: Bob
line: Is this an episode? Is this one of Will's episodes?

name: Joyce
line: No. No! No. I'm sorry. I just... I don't... see how any of this is good for Will, or for you. And even if I wanted to play along, I mean, how could I figure anything out if I don't understand the context of the game?

name: Bob
line: Or... What? What is it? I know that shape. It's Lovers' Lake. It's Lovers' Lake. I get it. Okay, I get. That's Lake Jordan. And if that's Lake Jordan, then you can probably find... Yeah, that's, uh, Sattler's quarry. And if you just follow it naturally... it moves to... the Eno River. And there it is. That's the Eno, do you see it? Okay, so the lines aren't roads. But they act like roads. And they act like roads 'cause when you follow 'em, you'll see... they don't go over water. And that's the giveaway. That's the giveaway. Ha! Don't you get it? It's not a puzzle, it's a map. It's a map of Hawkins.

name: Hopper
line: Does anybody copy? Look, if anybody copies, this is Jim Hopper, Hawkins' Chief...

name: Dustin
line: Guys, this is Dustin again. Does anyone copy? This is a code red. I repeat, a code red! I really need someone to pick up here. Hopper's MIA, and I've got a code red. Code red! All right, it's Dustin again. Seriously, I have a code red.

name: Dustin
line: Erica? Erica, is Lucas there? Where is he?

name: Erica
line: Like I said, I don't know and I don't care.

name: Dustin
line: Please tell him it's super important. Please tell him that I have a code...

name: Erica
line: Mmm-hmm. I got a code for you instead. It's called code shut-your-mouth.

name: Becky
line: I just need a little help understanding, sweetie, okay? Can you tell me where you came from? Where you've been all this time?

name: Becky
line: A policeman and a woman came looking for you last year. Did they find you?

name: Eleven
line: She won't get better... will she?

name: Becky
line: They don't think so, no. But she's not in any pain. She's just stuck, they think. Like in a dream. A long dream.

name: Becky
line: We don't know. Sometimes she says different words. But usually those.

name: Becky
line: She always believed that you were out there. She always believed that you'd come home one day.

name: Becky
line: Pretty. I can get you a real bed, and you can stay here with me if you want. How's that sound?

name: Becky
line: I wanna help you, but to really do that, I need you to talk to me, okay? Doesn't have to be now. Doesn't have to be today. But when you're ready. Okay?

name: Becky
line: Oh, yeah, that. That happens sometimes. Old house, bad wiring... Or if you ask my crazy aunt Shirley, it's... haunted.

name: Becky
line: Sweetie, really, it's just the wiring.

name: Terry
line: It's Mama. Sunflower. Rainbow. Three to the right. Four to the left.

name: Bob
line: All right. All right. I'm 3.6 inches, what do you got?

name: Bob
line: What about Tippecanoe to Danford Creek?

name: Joyce
line: Oh, come on. This has gotta be enough.

name: Bob
line: It's not. It's... it's really not.

name: Joyce
line: Okay. Can't you figure it out?

name: Bob
line: Well, it's hard. The ratio isn't exactly one-to-one. I mean, if you're twisting my arm, and you are twisting my arm, I would say that the X is... maybe a half mile southeast of Danford?

name: Bob
line: What? Are we... we really going?

name: Karen
line: I don't know, Cath. Maybe if it was Margaret Thatcher, that'd be another story.

name: Karen
line: Ted, can you get that please?

name: Dustin
line: Your line has been busy for over two hours, Mr. Wheeler. Do you realize this?

name: Dustin
line: No? Well, where the hell is he?

name: Dustin
line: Will's. No one's picking up there. Nancy. What about Nancy?

name: Ted
line: Ally's. Our children don't live here anymore. You didn't know that?

name: Dustin
line: Son of a bitch. You're really no help at all, you know that?

name: Dustin
line: Listen... I've been thinking... I love you. I'm sorry.

name: Steve
line: I'm sorry? What the hell am I sorry for?

name: Dustin
line: Steve. Are those for Mr. or Mrs. Wheeler?

name: Dustin
line: Doesn't matter. We have bigger problems than your love life. Do you still have that bat?

name: Dustin
line: I'll explain it on the way.

name: Lucas
line: And that was the last we ever saw of her. After that, she was just gone. I can't believe it's been that long. Feels like yesterday.

name: Max
line: I know. It's crazy, but... I really liked it.

name: Max
line: Yeah. Well, I mean, I had a few issues.

name: Max
line: I felt it was a little derivative in parts.

name: Max
line: I just wish it had a little more originality. That's all.

name: Max
line: Lucas, come on, seriously? How gullible do you think I am?

name: Lucas
line: Why would I make this up?

name: Max
line: I don't know. To impress me or something? Or you're just, like, insane.

name: Lucas
line: I tell you all of this. I mean, top-secret stuff. Risking my life. And this is how you react?

name: Lucas
line: Oh, so this is funny to you?

name: Max
line: Yeah. I mean... kind of funny. Stupid, but funny.

name: Lucas
line: What's wrong with you? I gave you what you wanted.

name: Max
line: I wanted to be a part of the group, not a part of some joke.

name: Max
line: You did a good job, okay? You can go tell the others I believed your lies if it gets you experience points or whatever.

name: Lucas
line: We have a lot of rules in our party, but the most important is, 'Friends don't lie.' Never ever. No matter what.

name: Lucas
line: Then how do you explain this?

name: Max
line: I had to do that. To protect you.

name: Lucas
line: To protect me from who, exactly?

name: Max
line: The big bad government baddies from Hawkins Lab?

name: Max
line: Maybe it was to protect me from the Demogorgon from another dimension?

name: Lucas
line: Max, I'm serious, shut up! Oh, no, no! You know what it was? It was Eleven. The girl...

name: Lucas
line: You're going to get us killed. Do you understand?

name: Max
line: So what? I'm supposed to just trust you?

name: Billy
line: Shit. I gotta go. Um... Don't follow me out. Okay?

name: Billy
line: You know what I'm talking about.

name: Max
line: Oh, Lucas? So he has a name now, huh?

name: Billy
line: It's a small town, okay? We weren't hanging out.

name: Max
line: Hmm. Well, you know what happens when you lie.

name: Owens
line: What if they try to replicate that? The more attention we bring to ourselves, the more people like the Hollands who know the truth, the more likely that scenario becomes. You see why I have to stop the truth from spreading, too. Just the same as those weeds there. By whatever means necessary.

name: Jonathan
line: The tape recording, is it enough? Is it incriminating?

name: Nancy
line: It's a central nervous system depressant. So yes, with vodka.

name: Nancy
line: How long is this gonna take?

name: Nancy
line: Is the tape incriminating or not? It's a simple question.

name: Murray
line: There's nothing simple about it. Nothing simple about anything you've told me.

name: Nancy
line: You don't believe us, do you?

name: Murray
line: I believe you, but that's not the problem. You don't need me to believe you. You need them to believe you.

name: Murray
line: Them. With a capital 'T.' Your priest, your postman, your teacher, the world at large. They won't believe any of this.

name: Nancy
line: That's why we made the tape.

name: Murray
line: Oh. That's easy to bury. Easy.

name: Nancy
line: He admits it. You heard it. He admits culpability.

name: Murray
line: You're being naive, Nancy! Those people... They're not wired like me and you, okay? They don't spend their lives trying to get a look at what's behind the curtain. They like the curtain. It provides them stability, comfort, definition. This... this would open the curtain, and open the curtain behind that curtain, okay? So the minute someone with an ounce of authority calls bullshit, everyone will nod their heads and say, 'See? Ha! I knew it! It was bullshit.' That is, if you even get their attention at all.

name: Nancy
line: You're saying we did all of this for nothing?

name: Murray
line: That's it. That's it! It's just too strong. Too strong. Better. Perfect. We water it down.

name: Murray
line: Your story. We moderate it. Just like this drink here. We make it more tolerable. Perhaps Barbara was exposed to some dangerous toxins. A leak from the lab. Like Three Mile Island or something. Something scary but familiar. Close enough that it hits the man right where it hurts. And those assholes that killed Barb... They'll go down.

name: Owens
line: All right, what are we looking at?

name: lab technician
line: This was some of the soil we took yesterday.

name: Owens
line: Okay. So what is your concern?

name: lab technician
line: Well, we didn't find any signs of contamination. Uh, nothing hazardous other than some pesticides.

name: Becky
line: It's okay if I sit here, right?

name: Becky
line: And I won't mess it up or anything?

name: Becky
line: Okay. If you talk to Terry, will you tell her that I love her very much? And that I'm sorry that I didn't believe...

name: Terry
line: Breathe. Sunflower. Rainbow. Three to the right. Four to the left. Four-fifty. Breathe.

name: Terry
line: Breathe. Sunflower. Rainbow. Three to the right. Four to the left. Four-fifty.

name: Eleven
line: Mama, it's me... Jane. I'm here now.

name: Terry
line: Breathe. Sunflower. Four-fifty. Breathe. Sunflower. Rainbow.

name: Eleven
line: What do I do? Mama, what do I do? Help me!

name: Becky
line: Breathe. Breathe. Just breathe. Breathe. Just breathe, all right? They're on their way. They're on their way, okay?

name: Becky
line: Stay with us, darling. Stay with us.

name: Terry
line: She was crying. I heard it. He was there.

name: Terry
line: Three to the right. Four to the left.

name: Unknown
line: Ma'am, can I see your badge?

name: Terry
line: Jane? Jane? Jane... No! No! No! She's my child! No! She's my child!

name: Terry
line: Sunflower. Three to the right. Four to the left. Rainbow. Four-fifty. Jane... No! Four-fifty. Breathe. Three to the right. Four to the left. Sunflower. Rainbow. Three to the right. Four to the left. Four-fifty. Sunflower. Rainbow.

name: Bob
line: It means we're close. I don't know. It's not precise.

name: Joyce
line: But we did all that work.

name: Bob
line: I told you, the scale ratio is not exactly one-to-one. We needed to take...

name: Joyce
line: Boys, I need you to stay here.

name: Mike
line: No. Mom, Mom, Mom, it's not safe.

name: Joyce
line: That's why I need you to stay here! Stay here!

name: Joyce
line: Hopper! Hey, be careful. Just going down the hole.

name: Joyce
line: I need you to help me get down there.

name: Bob
line: Joyce, what are you talking about?

name: Bob
line: Joyce, what is going on? Where are we?

name: Bob
line: Tunnels. Is this Will's map? We're in Will's map. We're actually inside of Will's map. How did he know all this?

name: Joyce
line: Bob! Over here! It's his. He's gotta be this way.

name: Joyce
line: Hopper! Do you see anything? I mean, in your now-memories?

name: Joyce
line: Hopper! Hopper! What? This is... Oh! It's his arm.

name: Joyce
line: Oh, my God. Hopper, are you okay? Are you okay?

name: Hopper
line: Go! Go! Go! Clear the area!

name: Mike
line: Will? Will, you okay? Will, what's wrong?
